Looks like the NPE is coming from JCORE.

The NPE can happen only if a null project is passed to 
JavaCore.getClasspathContainer(...) by UserLibraryWizardPage.updateLibraryList
(...).

Moving to JDT UI for comments.
We pass in a null project to the container wizard (which is doc'd as valid).
verified on I20040611 in code. fProject can't be null anymore.
